verses.verse: מִי־ <WH4310> Who זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> is this בָּ֣א <WH935> Who [is] this that cometh מֵאֱד֗וֹם <WH123> from Edom חֲמ֤וּץ <WH2556> with dyed בְּגָדִים֙ <WH899> garments מִבָּצְרָ֔ה <WH1224> Bozrah זֶ֚ה <WH2088> This הָד֣וּר <WH1921> is majestic בִּלְבוּשׁ֔וֹ <WH3830> in his apparel צֹעֶ֖ה <WH6808> travelling בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> in the greatness כֹּח֑וֹ <WH3581> ability אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I מְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> answer בִּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> in righteousness רַ֥ב <WH7227> mighty לְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> to save

מַדּ֥וּעַ <WH4069> Why אָדֹ֖ם <WH122> Wherefore [art thou] red לִלְבוּשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH3830> in thine apparel וּבְגָדֶ֖יךָ <WH899> and thy garments כְּדֹרֵ֥ךְ <WH1869> like him that treadeth בְּגַֽת׃ <WH1660> the wine

פּוּרָ֣ה ׀ <WH6333> the winepress דָּרַ֣כְתִּי <WH1869> I have trodden לְבַדִּ֗י <WH905> alone וּמֵֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> alone and of the people אֵֽין־ <WH369> there אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [there was] none אִתִּ֔י <WH854> also וְאֶדְרְכֵ֣ם <WH1869> with me for I will tread בְּאַפִּ֔י <WH639> them in mine anger וְאֶרְמְסֵ֖ם <WH7429> and trample בַּחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> them in my fury וְיֵ֤ז <WH5137> shall be sprinkled נִצְחָם֙ <WH5332> and their blood עַל־ <WH5921> on בְּגָדַ֔י <WH899> upon my garments וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְבּוּשַׁ֖י <WH4403> all my raiment אֶגְאָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH1351> and I will stain

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For י֥וֹם <WH3117> For the day נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> of vengeance בְּלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> [is] in mine heart וּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> and the year גְּאוּלַ֖י <WH1350> of my redeemed בָּֽאָה׃ <WH935> is come

וְאַבִּיט֙ <WH5027> And I looked וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there עֹזֵ֔ר <WH5826> and [there was] none to help וְאֶשְׁתּוֹמֵ֖ם <WH8074> and I wondered וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> was no סוֹמֵ֑ךְ <WH5564> that [there was] none to uphold וַתּ֤וֹשַֽׁע <WH3467> brought salvation לִי֙ זְרֹעִ֔י <WH2220> therefore mine own arm וַחֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> unto me and my fury הִ֥יא <WH1931> he סְמָכָֽתְנִי׃ <WH5564> it upheld

וְאָב֤וּס <WH947> And I will tread down עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> the people בְּאַפִּ֔י <WH639> in mine anger וַאֲשַׁכְּרֵ֖ם <WH7937> and make them drunk בַּחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> in my fury וְאוֹרִ֥יד <WH3381> and I will bring down לָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> to the earth נִצְחָֽם׃ <WH5332> their strength ס

חַֽסְדֵ֨י <WH2617> the lovingkindnesses יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אַזְכִּיר֙ <WH2142> I will mention תְּהִלֹּ֣ת <WH8416> [and] the praises יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּעַ֕ל <WH5921> According כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which גְּמָלָ֖נוּ <WH1580> hath bestowed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> according to all that the LORD וְרַב־ <WH7227> on us and the great טוּב֙ <WH2898> goodness לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> toward the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which גְּמָלָ֥ם <WH1580> which he hath bestowed כְּֽרַחֲמָ֖יו <WH7356> on them according to his mercies וּכְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and according to the multitude חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <WH2617> of his lovingkindnesses

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> For he said אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> Surely they [are] my people הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children לֹ֣א <WH3808> who will not יְשַׁקֵּ֑רוּ <WH8266> [that] will not lie וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like לְמוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> so he was their Saviour

בְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> all צָרָתָ֣ם ׀ <WH6869> In all their affliction [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) צָ֗ר <WH6862> he was afflicted וּמַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> and the angel פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> of his presence הֽוֹשִׁיעָ֔ם <WH3467> saved בְּאַהֲבָת֥וֹ <WH160> them in his love וּבְחֶמְלָת֖וֹ <WH2551> and in his pity ה֣וּא <WH1931> He גְאָלָ֑ם <WH1350> he redeemed וַֽיְנַטְּלֵ֥ם <WH5190> them and he bare וַֽיְנַשְּׂאֵ֖ם <WH5375> them and carried כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> them all the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of old

וְהֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> they מָר֥וּ <WH4784> But they rebelled וְעִצְּב֖וּ <WH6087> and vexed אֶת־ <WH853> ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Spirit קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> his holy וַיֵּהָפֵ֥ךְ <WH2015> therefore he was turned לָהֶ֛ם לְאוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> to be their enemy ה֥וּא <WH1931> He נִלְחַם־ <WH3898> [and] he fought בָּֽם׃

וַיִּזְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> Then he remembered יְמֵֽי־ <WH3117> the days עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> of old מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> [and] his people אַיֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH346> Where הַֽמַּעֲלֵ֣ם <WH5927> [saying] Where [is] he that brought them up מִיָּ֗ם <WH3220> out of the sea אֵ֚ת <WH854> with רֹעֵ֣י <WH7462> with the shepherd צֹאנ֔וֹ <WH6629> cattle אַיֵּ֛ה <WH346> Where הַשָּׂ֥ם <WH7760> put בְּקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> within אֶת־ <WH853> ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Spirit קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> his holy

מוֹלִיךְ֙ <WH1980> to go לִימִ֣ין <WH3225> [them] by the right hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> arm תִּפְאַרְתּ֑וֹ <WH8597> with his glorious בּ֤וֹקֵֽעַ <WH1234> dividing מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the water מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> them to make ל֖וֹ שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> himself an everlasting

מוֹלִיכָ֖ם <WH1980> led בַּתְּהֹמ֑וֹת <WH8415> them through the deep כַּסּ֥וּס <WH5483> as an horse בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <WH3782> [that] they should not stumble

כַּבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> As a beast בַּבִּקְעָ֣ה <WH1237> into the valley תֵרֵ֔ד <WH3381> goeth down ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> the Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD תְּנִיחֶ֑נּוּ <WH5117> caused him to rest כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> So נִהַ֣גְתָּ <WH5090> so didst thou lead עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> thy people לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to make לְךָ֖ שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name תִּפְאָֽרֶת׃ <WH8597> thyself a glorious

הַבֵּ֤ט <WH5027> Look down מִשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> from heaven וּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> and behold מִזְּבֻ֥ל <WH2073> from the habitation קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <WH6944> of thy holiness וְתִפְאַרְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH8597> and of thy glory אַיֵּ֤ה <WH346> Where קִנְאָֽתְךָ֙ <WH7068> where [is] thy zeal וּגְב֣וּרֹתֶ֔ךָ <WH1369> and thy strength הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> the sounding מֵעֶ֛יךָ <WH4578> of thy bowels וְֽרַחֲמֶ֖יךָ <WH7356> and of thy mercies אֵלַ֥י <WH413> toward הִתְאַפָּֽקוּ׃ <WH662> toward me? are they restrained

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Doubtless אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> thou [art] our father כִּ֤י <WH3588> though אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> though Abraham לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יְדָעָ֔נוּ <WH3045> know וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of us and Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַכִּירָ֑נוּ <WH5234> acknowledge אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> us not thou O LORD אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> [art] our father גֹּאֲלֵ֥נוּ <WH1350> our redeemer מֵֽעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [is] from everlasting שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why תַתְעֵ֤נוּ <WH8582> why hast thou made us to err יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD מִדְּרָכֶ֔יךָ <WH1870> from thy ways תַּקְשִׁ֥יחַ <WH7188> [and] hardened לִבֵּ֖נוּ <WH3820> our heart מִיִּרְאָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3374> fearing שׁ֚וּב <WH7725> Return לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> for thy servants' שִׁבְטֵ֖י <WH7626> sake the tribes נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5159> of thine inheritance

לַמִּצְעָ֕ר <WH4705> [it] but a little while יָרְשׁ֖וּ <WH3423> have possessed עַם־ <WH5971> The people קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> of thy holiness צָרֵ֕ינוּ <WH6862> our adversaries בּוֹסְס֖וּ <WH947> have trodden down מִקְדָּשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH4720> thy sanctuary

הָיִ֗ינוּ <WH1961> have become מֵֽעוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> We are [thine] thou never לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not מָשַׁ֣לְתָּ <WH4910> barest rule בָּ֔ם לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> over them they were not called שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> by thy name עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and לוּא־
